name: Planet Defender (itch) (irishgold15)
description:
Your planet is under attack! It's up to you to stop your planets total destruction. Build your defenses and defend your planet for as long as possible. Good luck space walker!  

The game is an arcade survival shooter, where you defend your planet on all sides from asteroids and alien invaders. Using upgrades like turrets, shield generates, and different ammo types, build your defenses and try to survive as long as possible. Be careful though your money is your score, so spend wisely!

This is a game created by a team of graduate students at the Florida Interactive Entertainment Academy in Orlando Florida. It was created within 3 weeks for a Rapid Prototype Production class and will continue to be updated if there is an interest for the game.
